long_description: The REI Garrett Moc slippers wrap your feet entirely in luxurious sheepskin leather, with wool linings to boost the coziness factor. You'll never worry about cold feet around the house again. Luxurious and warm, double-face sheepskin uppers provide the ultimate in barefoot comfort for leisurely padding around. Fully lined in genuine sheepskin wool that naturally wicks moisture and is hypoallergenic and biodegradable. Contoured memory foam footbeds sit over a layer of EVA for light, plush cushioning underfoot. Heel loops make it easy to pull on the REI Garrett Moc slippers. Thermoplastic rubber outsoles are flexible, lightweight and skid resistant-perfect for around the house and occasional outdoor use.
short_description: The REI Garrett Moc slippers wrap your feet entirely in luxurious sheepskin leather, with wool linings to boost the coziness factor. You'll never worry about cold feet around the house again.
